I'm honored to be a member of the \[quant_flare\] project team.

Below, you'll find a brief summary of our project. To access a detailed project description, please go to [Project Web Site](https://emu-hacettepe-analytics.github.io/emu430-fall2023-team-quant_flare/).

**Summary**

The main goal of this study is to understand the changes in Turkey's population structure in depth, to determine the potential impacts of these changes on society and to predict future demographic trends.
